text: Sandra Paola Luzardo León (born 18 July 1999) is a Venezuelan footballer who plays as a centre back for Spanish Segunda División Pro club Alhama CF and the Venezuela women's national team. ==International career== Luzardo represented Venezuela at the 2014 Summer Youth Olympics and two FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup editions (2014 and 2016). At senior level, she made her debut on 22 November 2014 in a 3–0 friendly victory against Nicaragua. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football central defenders Category:Venezuelan women's footballers Category:Venezuela women's international footballers Category:Competitors at the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games Category:Olympic silver medalists for Venezuela Category:Footballers at the 2014 Summer Youth Olympics Category:Primera División (women) players Category:Venezuelan expatriate women's footballers Category:Venezuelan expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Spain
title: Sandra Luzardo
